name: demo-task-app
description: Full-stack task management application with edit history tracking
author: peaske

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd .. && npm run init-data
scripts.init-data: cp backend/data/tasks.init.json backend/data/tasks.json && cp backend/data/history.init.json backend/data/history.json
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "npm run dev"
